external_games.name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Hardcore Package Part 1 DLC

name: Hacker Evolution Duality: Hardcore Package Part 1
summary: Ready for some more hardcore action in Hacker Evolution Duality? The Hardcore Package 1 DLC for Hacker Evolution Duality brings you 2 new levels designed for gamers who like a challenge that is harder than the original game.
